description: The Chinese astilbe (Astilbe chinensis var. taquetii 'Superba') is an amazing plant for the garden. It has lush and lush foliage in the form of bright green, deeply divided leaves and tall deep rose flower spikes that age to deep pink. It grows in semi-shade or sun and prefers moist soil. The blooms are compact and long lasting, often lasting until first frost. It also serves as a great ground cover as it grows to a height of 12-24 inches. Its beauty and ease of maintenance make it a popular choice for any shade garden.
